title: Wait But Why
meta_description: A popular long-form, stick-figure-illustrated blog about almost everything.
content: Wait But Why BREAKING NEWS: Go read my new book. The Marriage Decision: Everything Forever or Nothing Ever Again 140 comments Let’s take a deep breath and figure this out together. ... Read More 538 0 Latest Posts 84 comments Jeez ... Read More 82 0 94 comments Welcome to the 2030s. ... Read More 92 0 191 comments 1 baby, many thoughts ... Read More 189 0 418 comments On June 18, 2016, I slipped and fell down a deep, deep hole. ... Read More 417 0 171 comments We have a whole lot to talk about. ... Read More 173 0 757 comments In case you missed it… ... Read More 758 0 171 comments I have a surprise for you. ... Read More 169 0 389 comments A highly unexpected turn of events. ... Read More 382 0 557 comments Some people are young, just not you. ... Read More 536 0 351 comments Our career path is how we spend our time, support our lifestyles, make our impact, even define our identity. Let’s make sure we’re on the right track. ...
